actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against gross income for organ donation.
short_title: Help Organ Procurement Expand Act of 2001

summary.text: Help Organ Procurement Expand Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a $2,500 tax credit for qualified organ donations.

titles.title: Help Organ Procurement Expand Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against gross income for organ donation.
